comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

At several websites, Firefox 4 jumps to another page after momentarily displaying the page I want to view., sometimes blank without any input from me. After entering username and password when required, Firefox 4 automatically jumps to the next page without waiting for me to click 'login' or 'continue'. Sometimes to the wrong page (e.g. Spanish version rather than English version). This never happened with previous versions and does not happen with Internet Explorer. I shall be uninstalling Firefox 4 and returning to Firefox 3.6.


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Just go to any of several websites
2.
3.
